component.name: MarkupListExample
component.script:
sub init() markuplist = m.top.findNode("exampleMarkupList")
markuplist.content = createObject("roSGNode", "MarkupListContent")
examplerect = m.top.boundingRect() centerx = (1280 - examplerect.width) / 2 centery = (720 - examplerect.height) / 2 m.top.translation = [ centerx, centery ] end sub
